page.title: 15Leisure Activities in Ryhope
page.content: Many of the children belong to the local branches of Cubs, Scouts, Boys' Brigade, Brownies or Guides and there are also{Sunday Schools}and church adventure clubs. We discovered that grown-ups do not seem to like doing energetic things. They are quite happy going to the local branch{library}or to the large {bingo hall,}growing vegetables to enter in shows, breeding racing pigeons, or spending their evenings in a pub or club which often has live entertainment like pop groups or comedians. Most people that we asked said that there weren't enough{leisure {facilities}in our area. Many thought that we should have a decent park and that the recreation park should be improved and a lot of us wish there was a cinema for us to enjoy.
